name: Biker Clinic
description:
This is a game where you prevent a group of elderly bikers from making their joy ride their final ride.

The goal of this project was to try making a game under a certain time limit from a random prompt. The time limit was 2 hours but I went in to overtime 10 times. A over time being 10 minutes. So the actual time of creation was 3 hours and 40 minutes. Not bad for a first attempt at this quick style, but it is a -10. The prompt I generated was handicapped motorcycle and medicine.
